question: Q: Yesterday was 12/31/1929. Today could not be 12/32/1929 because December has only 31 days. What is the date today in MM/DD/YYYY?
rationale:
(1) If yesterday was 12/31/1929 and today is not 12/32/1929 because December has only 31 days, then today is not December.
(2) Today is January. There are only 31 days in January.
(3) So the date today is either 01/01/1930 or 01/31/1930.
(4) If today is 01/31/1930, then yesterday is 01/30/1930.
(5) However, if yesterday was 01/30/1930, then last month is December and last year is 1929. This is a contradiction.
(6) So the date today is 01/01/1930, that is 01/01/1930.
(Final response) So the answer is (E).
